name: ICDeviceDelegate
desc: Methods for responding to device events and changes.

items.name: func device(ICDevice, didOpenSessionWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when a session is opened on a device.

items.name: func device(ICDevice, didCloseSessionWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when a session is closed on a device.

items.name: func didRemove(ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a device has been removed.

items.name: func deviceDidBecomeReady(ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the device is ready to receive requests.

items.name: func device(ICDevice, didReceiveStatusInformation: [ICDeviceStatus : Any])
items.desc: Tells the delegate when status information is received from a device.

items.name: func device(ICDevice, didEncounterError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when a device encounters an error.

items.name: func device(ICDevice, didEjectWithError: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the ejection is complete.

items.name: func deviceDidChangeName(ICDevice)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the name of a device changes.
